content: Casting immobilize on the Apramana Bat when it's grounded is a good way to get enough time to land some hits before it leaps into the air again, but make sure you don't cast it too early. If you freeze the Apramana Bat in the air, you might not be able to reach it with your attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Apramana Bat Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Casting immobilize on the Apramana Bat when it's grounded is a good way to get enough time to land some hits before it leaps into the air again, but make sure you don't cast it too early. If you freeze the Apramana Bat in the air, you might not be able to reach it with your attacks.
